Corporate

Learning Labs & Working Labs powered by Lyra™ Technology

Success in today’s world requires daily innovation and problem solving to drive everything from product development to sales. Lyra™ by Fullbridge powers in-person, team learning experiences called Learning Labs and ongoing practice modules called Working Labs for new hires, high performers and corporate leadership. The Fullbridge Learning Experience Helps

  1. Generate a learning culture where people discover how to work more effectively in teams (ideal length: 90 characters)
  2. Align their efforts to business objectives (ideal length: 90 characters)
  3. Engage in solving the problems that drive success (ideal length: 90 characters)
